wikipedia_page.main: Michael Macari (born 4 February 1973) is a Scottish former professional footballer who played for Stoke City as a striker.

response: Paul Macari (born 23 August 1976) is a Scottish former professional footballer. The son of former Scotland international Lou Macari, he played professionally for Stoke City and Huddersfield Town. His brother Mike Macari was also a professional footballer.
* Lou Macari, Mike Macari (son),  Paul Macari (son)
